title: 820-2915 Question
message:
Hi 
I have a early 2011 MacBook Pro 2011 goes through book process and all works until it gets to last screen which is BLANK White.
I tried a different drive but same result.
  Im going to replace the tangent capacitor but has a different number then previous on.
I am going to replace with a 330uf? Scamedic says 220uf
Attached is a pic of the old cap on board.
Thanks

title: 820-2915 Question
message: the only thing you need to replace is GPU...... Apply some heat to the GPU and test again, I bet it will boot !!

title: 820-2915 Question
message: Probably will. Yes but wondering if replacing the Cap will work.

title: 820-2915 Question
message: Maybe yes but not because of the replaced cap, will work because of the heat applied will reach GPU and bring back to life a zombie....:):):)

title: 820-2915 Question
message: Replace the GPU. Good luck finding a REAL new one.....
